Source.Name: scrot
Source.Summary: scrot (SCReen shOT) is a simple commandline screen capture utility
Source.Description: scrot (SCReen shOT) is a simple commandline screen capture utility that uses imlib2 to grab and save images. Multiple image formats are supported through imlib2's dynamic saver modules.
